DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Have fast plasma HDLc concentration < =45mg/dL ( < =1.16mmol/L ) , plasma LDLc level require treatment accord National Cholesterol Education Program/Adult Treatment Panel III ( NCEP/ATPÃ‚ III ) guideline . Have fast plasma TG concentration =500mg/dL ( =5.65mmol/L ) . Exclusion criterion : Coronary heart disease . Diabetes mellitus . Atherosclerotic disease .
